data.comment: The match is underway in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Craig Pawson signals a throw-in for Man Utd, close to Newcastle's area.
In the minute 2, Luke Shaw has the misfortune to make it 1-0 through an own goal.
Man Utd drive upfield and Daniel James gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Newcastle defender.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
In the minute 4, Fred of Man Utd gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Craig Pawson signals a Man Utd throw-in in Newcastle's half.
In the minute 6, Can Newcastle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
Craig Pawson awards Newcastle a goal kick.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
Throw-in for Newcastle at St James' Park.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 14, Important block from the Newcastle defence as Marcus Rashford fires in a strike for Man Utd.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Fred (Man Utd) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 15, Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
In Newcastle upon Tyne Man Utd attack through Marcus Rashford. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
In the minute 17, Ball safe as Newcastle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
Throw-in for Man Utd in the half of Newcastle.
In the minute 19, Man Utd's Juan Mata has run offside.
Jonjo Shelvey gets his shot on target but fails to score for Newcastle.
Juan Mata of Man Utd smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 23, Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
Harry Maguire (Man Utd) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
That's a fine assist from Juan Mata.
In the minute 24, Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Newcastle to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
Goal kick for Newcastle at St James' Park.
In the minute 29, Man Utd drives forward and Marcus Rashford gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Newcastle in the half of Man Utd.
Newcastle pushes forward through Allan Saint-Maximin, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Newcastle in the half of Man Utd.
Attention is being given to Man Utdâ€™s David De Gea and play has been suspended briefly.
Craig Pawson awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
David De Gea has recovered and rejoins the match in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Throw-in Newcastle.
In the minute 34, Newcastle needs to be cautious. Man Utd have an attacking throw-in.
Daniel James (Man Utd) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
In the minute 35, Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Man Utd's Aaron Wan-Bissaka is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 37, Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
Man Utd push forward at St James' Park and Marcus Rashford gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Newcastle defence.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, At St James' Park, Daniel James has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The match at St James' Park has been interrupted briefly for a check on Marcus Rashford, who is down injured.
Allan Saint-Maximin is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 39, Marcus Rashford returns to the field for Man Utd after picking up a slight injury.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Newcastle's Allan Saint-Maximin looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 40, Craig Pawson signals a Newcastle throw-in in Man Utd's half.
Can Newcastle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 43, Man Utd to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
Man Utd's Marcus Rashford gets in a shot on goal at St James' Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Newcastle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Newcastle.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Craig Pawson awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Craig Pawson signals a Newcastle throw-in in Man Utd's half.
Throw-in for Man Utd at St James' Park.
In Newcastle upon Tyne Man Utd drive forward through Daniel James. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Isaac Hayden is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Man Utd are pushing forward but Bruno Fernandes's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 49, Newcastle have a goal kick.
It seems as if Isaac Hayden is unable to continue. Fabian Schar replaces him for the home team.
In Newcastle upon Tyne, Callum Wilson of Newcastle is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 51, Callum Wilson for Newcastle drives towards goal at St James' Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Emil Krafth.
Man Utd are coming forward and Fred gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 52, It's a goal kick for the home team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Newcastle to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
In the minute 55, Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Newcastle.
Man Utd have been given a penalty...
Man Utd are awarded a penalty ... Bruno Fernandes botches the spot kick!
In the minute 58, Man Utd have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Man Utd's Harry Maguire goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Newcastle at St James' Park.
In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Emil Krafth is back on his feet again.
In the minute 61, Aaron Wan-Bissaka gets his shot on target but fails to score for Man Utd.
Man Utd drives forward and Fred gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in high up the field for Newcastle in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 64, Newcastle are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Newcastle close to the penalty box.
In Newcastle upon Tyne Man Utd's Marcus Rashford is caught offside.
In the minute 67, Emil Krafth for Newcastle has been booked by Craig Pawson and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Newcastle in the half of Man Utd.
Can Newcastle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
In the minute 69, Newcastle's Jonjo Shelvey misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
Paul Pogba is on a sub for Fred for Man Utd.
In the minute 70, Man Utd's Luke Shaw gets in a shot on goal at St James' Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Scott McTominay (Man Utd) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 72, Man Utd's Daniel James gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Newcastle defender.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The home team have replaced Joelinton with Ryan Fraser. This is the second substitution made today by Steve Bruce.
Goal kick for Newcastle at St James' Park.
Throw-in for Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 76, Donny van de Beek is replacing Daniel James for the away team.
Free kick Man Utd.
In the minute 78, Can Newcastle capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Man Utd's half?
Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Man Utd.
In the minute 80, Man Utd have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Harry Maguire of Man Utd gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 80, Craig Pawson awards Newcastle a goal kick.
Goal kick for Newcastle at St James' Park.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 85, Ball safe as Man Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Newcastle.
Goal! Bruno Fernandes gives Man Utd a 1-2 lead.
In the minute 86, Great play from Marcus Rashford to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Newcastle in the half of Man Utd.
Steve Bruce is making the team's third substitution at St James' Park with Miguel Almiron replacing Jeff Hendrick.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Newcastle in the half of Man Utd.
Man Utd drive upfield and Bruno Fernandes gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Newcastle defender.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Can Man Utd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Newcastle's half?
Newcastle to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-4.
Man Utd take a comfortable 1-3 lead thanks to Aaron Wan-Bissaka.
Marcus Rashford with an assist there.
The away team replace Juan Mata with Nemanja Matic.
Goal! Man Utd extend their lead to 1-4 through Marcus Rashford.
Bruno Fernandes instrumental with a fine assist.
